## Me-API Playground - Project Instructions

This is a full-stack Node.js application for candidate profile management.

### Architecture
- Backend: Node.js + Express + PostgreSQL + Prisma
- Frontend: Vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- Deployment: Ready for Render/Railway/Fly.io

### Key Features
- REST API for profile CRUD operations
- Query endpoints (search by skill, top skills)
- Minimal frontend for profile display and search
- Database seeding with candidate data
- Health check endpoint
- Comprehensive error handling
